trans-unit.source: Represents a displacement in 2-D space.
trans-unit.target: 表示二维空间中的位移。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Point> represents a fixed position, but a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> represents a direction and a magnitude (for example, velocity or acceleration).
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Point>表示固定的位置，但<xref:System.Windows.Vector>表示方向和大小 （例如，速度或加速）。

trans-unit.source: Thus, the endpoints of a line segment are points but their difference is a vector; that is, the direction and length of that line segment.
trans-unit.target: 因此，一条线段的终结点是点，但其区别是一个向量;即的方向和长度的行段。

trans-unit.source: In XAML, the delimiter between the <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> values of a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> can be either a comma or a space.
trans-unit.target: 在 XAML 中，之间的分隔符<xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A>值<xref:System.Windows.Vector>可以是逗号或空格。

trans-unit.source: Some cultures might use the comma character as the decimal delimiter instead of the period character.
trans-unit.target: 某些区域性可能会使用逗号字符作为小数分隔符而不是句点字符。

trans-unit.source: XAML processing for invariant culture defaults to en-US in most XAML processor implementations, and expects the period to be the decimal delimiter.
trans-unit.target: XAML 处理固定区域性为 EN-US 在大多数 XAML 处理器实现中，默认设置，并且需要要将小数分隔符的段。

trans-unit.source: You should avoid using the comma character as the decimal delimiter if specifying a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> in XAML, because that will clash with the string type conversion of a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> attribute value into the <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> components.
trans-unit.target: 你应避免使用逗号字符作为小数分隔符，如果指定<xref:System.Windows.Vector>在 XAML 中，因为，将能与字符串类型转换的冲突<xref:System.Windows.Vector>属性值转换为<xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A>组件。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: The vector's X component.
trans-unit.target: 向量的 X 分量。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The vector's Y component.
trans-unit.target: 向量的 Y 分量。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> 偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" />-offset of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" />.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> 偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> 结构的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Adds a vector to a point or to another vector.
trans-unit.target: 将向量添加到点或其他向量。

trans-unit.source: The amount to translate the specified point.
trans-unit.target: 指定点的平移量。

trans-unit.source: The point to translate.
trans-unit.target: 要平移的点。

trans-unit.source: Translates the specified point by the specified vector and returns the resulting point.
trans-unit.target: 按指定向量平移指定点，并返回结果点。

trans-unit.source: The result of translating <paramref name="point" /> by <paramref name="vector" />.
trans-unit.target: 按 <paramref name="point" /> 平移 <paramref name="vector" /> 的结果。

trans-unit.target: 要相加的第二个向量。

trans-unit.target: 将两个向量相加并将结果以 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> 结构的形式返回。

trans-unit.source: The sum of <paramref name="vector1" /> and <paramref name="vector2" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="vector1" /> 与 <paramref name="vector2" /> 的和。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法添加两个<xref:System.Windows.Vector>结构。

trans-unit.target: 要计算的第一个向量。

trans-unit.source: The second vector to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 要计算的第二个向量。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the angle, expressed in degrees, between the two specified vectors.
trans-unit.target: 检索两个指定向量之间的角度（用度表示）。

trans-unit.source: The angle, in degrees, between <paramref name="vector1" /> and <paramref name="vector2" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="vector1" /> 和 <paramref name="vector2" /> 之间的角度（以度为单位）。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法以获取两个角度<xref:System.Windows.Vector>结构。

trans-unit.source: The first vector to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 要计算的第一个向量。

trans-unit.source: The second vector to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 要计算的第二个向量。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the cross product of two vectors.
trans-unit.target: 计算两个向量的叉积。

trans-unit.source: The cross product of <paramref name="vector1" /> and <paramref name="vector2" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="vector1" /> 和 <paramref name="vector2" /> 的叉乘积。

trans-unit.source: The following formula is used to calculate the cross product:
trans-unit.target: 可使用下面的公式计算叉乘积：

trans-unit.source: <c>(Vector1.X * Vector2.Y) - (Vector1.Y * Vector2.X)</c>
trans-unit.target: <c>(Vector1.X * Vector2.Y) - (Vector1.Y * Vector2.X)</c>

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法来计算两个叉积<xref:System.Windows.Vector>结构。

trans-unit.source: The first vector to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 要计算的第一个向量。

trans-unit.source: The second vector to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 要计算的第二个向量。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the determinant of two vectors.
trans-unit.target: 计算两个向量的行列式。

trans-unit.source: The determinant of <paramref name="vector1" /> and <paramref name="vector2" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="vector1" /> 和 <paramref name="vector2" /> 的行列式。

trans-unit.source: The vector structure to divide.
trans-unit.target: 作为除数的向量结构。

trans-unit.source: The amount by which <c>vector</c> is divided.
trans-unit.target: <c>vector</c> 的被除量。

trans-unit.source: Divides the specified vector by the specified scalar and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" />.
trans-unit.target: 将指定向量除以指定标量，并将结果以 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> 形式返回。

trans-unit.source: The result of dividing <paramref name="vector" /> by <paramref name="scalar" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="vector" /> 除以 <paramref name="scalar" /> 的结果。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法将划分<xref:System.Windows.Vector>标量。

trans-unit.source: Compares two vectors for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个向量是否相等。

trans-unit.source: A vector's <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> properties are described using <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: 向量的<xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A>属性描述了使用<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on it, a comparison between two <xref:System.Double> structures that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因为的值<xref:System.Double>它，比较两个执行算术运算时可能会丢失精度<xref:System.Double>逻辑上相等的结构可能会失败。

trans-unit.source: The vector to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的向量。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> structure and, if it is, whether it has the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> values as this vector.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 是不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> 结构，如果是，则确定其是否与此向量具有相同的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> and has the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> values as this vector; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="o" /> 是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> 并具有与此向量相同的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> 值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A vector's <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> properties are described using <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: 向量的<xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A>属性描述了使用<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on it, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structures that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因为的值<xref:System.Double>它，比较两个执行算术运算时可能会丢失精度<xref:System.Windows.Vector>逻辑上相等的结构可能会失败。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to check whether a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> and an <xref:System.Object> are equal.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法来检查是否<xref:System.Windows.Vector>和<xref:System.Object>是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The vector to compare with this vector.
trans-unit.target: 要与此向量比较的向量。

trans-unit.source: Compares two vectors for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个向量是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> has the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> values as this vector; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 具有与此向量相同的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> 值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A vector's <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> properties are described using <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: 向量的<xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A>属性描述了使用<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on it, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structures that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因为的值<xref:System.Double>它，比较两个执行算术运算时可能会丢失精度<xref:System.Windows.Vector>逻辑上相等的结构可能会失败。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to check whether two <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法来检查两个<xref:System.Windows.Vector>结构是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The first vector to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个向量。

trans-unit.source: The second vector to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个向量。

trans-unit.source: Compares the two specified vectors for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个指定向量是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if t he <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> components of <paramref name="vector1" /> and <paramref name="vector2" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="vector1" /> 和 <paramref name="vector2" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> 分量相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A vector's <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> properties are described using <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: 向量的<xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A>属性描述了使用<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on it, a comparison between two <xref:System.Double> structures that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因为的值<xref:System.Double>它，比较两个执行算术运算时可能会丢失精度<xref:System.Double>逻辑上相等的结构可能会失败。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法来检查两个<xref:System.Windows.Vector>结构是否相等。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this vector.
trans-unit.target: 返回此向量的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the hash code of a <xref:System.Windows.Vector>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何获取的哈希代码<xref:System.Windows.Vector>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of this vector.
trans-unit.target: 获取此向量的长度。

trans-unit.source: The length of this vector.
trans-unit.target: 此向量的长度。

trans-unit.source: The length of a vector is sometimes referred to as the magnitude.
trans-unit.target: 向量的长度有时称为严重性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how use this property to get the length of a vector.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性来获取向量的长度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the square of the length of this vector.
trans-unit.target: 获取此向量的长度的平方。

trans-unit.source: The square of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Length" /> of this vector.
trans-unit.target: 此向量的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Length" /> 的平方。

trans-unit.source: The length of a vector is sometimes referred to as its magnitude.
trans-unit.target: 向量的长度有时称为其大小。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this property to get the square of the length of a vector.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性来获取向量的长度的平方。

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the specified vector by the specified <see cref="T:System.Double" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" />, or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> or <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: 将指定向量与指定的 <see cref="T:System.Double" />、<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> 相乘并将结果以 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 形式返回。

trans-unit.source: The scalar to multiply.
trans-unit.target: 要乘以的标量。

trans-unit.source: The vector to multiply.
trans-unit.target: 要相乘的向量。

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the specified scalar by the specified vector and returns the resulting <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" />.
trans-unit.target: 将指定标量与指定向量相乘，并返回结果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" />。

trans-unit.source: The result of multiplying <paramref name="scalar" /> and <paramref name="vector" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="scalar" /> 与 <paramref name="vector" /> 相乘的结果。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to multiply a scalar by a <xref:System.Windows.Vector>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法要相乘的标量<xref:System.Windows.Vector>。

trans-unit.source: The vector to multiply.
trans-unit.target: 要相乘的向量。

trans-unit.source: The scalar to multiply.
trans-unit.target: 要乘以的标量。

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the specified vector by the specified scalar and returns the resulting <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" />.
trans-unit.target: 将指定向量与指定标量相乘，并返回结果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" />。

trans-unit.source: The result of multiplying <paramref name="vector" /> and <paramref name="scalar" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="vector" /> 与 <paramref name="scalar" /> 相乘的结果。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to multiply a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> by a scalar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法要相乘<xref:System.Windows.Vector>标量。

trans-unit.source: The vector structure to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要变换的向量结构。

trans-unit.source: The transformation to apply to <c>vector</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要应用到此 <c>vector</c> 的转换。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the coordinate space of the specified vector using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> 变换指定向量的坐标空间。

trans-unit.source: The result of transforming <paramref name="vector" /> by <paramref name="matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 按 <paramref name="vector" /> 变换 <paramref name="matrix" /> 的结果。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to multiply a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法要相乘<xref:System.Windows.Vector>通过<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>。

trans-unit.source: The first vector to multiply.
trans-unit.target: 要相乘的第一个向量。

trans-unit.source: The second vector structure to multiply.
trans-unit.target: 要相乘的第二个向量结构。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the dot product of the two specified vectors and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: 计算两个指定向量的点积并将结果以 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 形式返回。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> containing the scalar dot product of <paramref name="vector1" /> and <paramref name="vector2" />, which is calculated using the following formula:
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Double" />，其中包含 <paramref name="vector1" /> 和 <paramref name="vector2" /> 的标量点积，标量点积可通过下面的公式计算得出：

trans-unit.source: <c>(vector1.X * vector2.X) + (vector1.Y * vector2.Y)</c>
trans-unit.target: <c>(vector1.X * vector2.X) + (vector1.Y * vector2.Y)</c>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to multiply a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> by a <xref:System.Windows.Vector>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法要相乘<xref:System.Windows.Vector>通过<xref:System.Windows.Vector>。

trans-unit.source: Negates this vector.
trans-unit.target: 对此向量求反。

trans-unit.source: The vector has the same magnitude as before, but its direction is now opposite.
trans-unit.target: 向量的大小与以前相同，但现在的方向与以前相反。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to negate a vector.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法要求反的向量。

trans-unit.source: Normalizes this vector.
trans-unit.target: 规范化此向量。

trans-unit.source: A normalized vector maintains its direction but its <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Length%2A> becomes 1.
trans-unit.target: 规范化的向量维护其方向但其<xref:System.Windows.Vector.Length%2A>成为 1。

trans-unit.source: The resulting vector is often called a unit vector.
trans-unit.target: 所得的向量情况通常称作单元向量。

trans-unit.source: A vector is normalized by dividing the vector by its own <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Length%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 一个向量，规范化的向量除以其自己<xref:System.Windows.Vector.Length%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to normalize a vector.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法要规范化的向量。

trans-unit.source: Adds a vector to a point or to another vector.
trans-unit.target: 将向量添加到点或其他向量。

trans-unit.source: The vector used to translate <c>point</c>.
trans-unit.target: 用于平移 <c>point</c> 的向量。

trans-unit.source: The point to translate.
trans-unit.target: 要平移的点。

trans-unit.source: Translates a point by the specified vector and returns the resulting point.
trans-unit.target: 按指定向量平移点，并返回结果点。

trans-unit.source: The result of translating <paramref name="point" /> by <paramref name="vector" />.
trans-unit.target: 按 <paramref name="point" /> 平移 <paramref name="vector" /> 的结果。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this operator (+) to translate a <xref:System.Windows.Point> structure to a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此运算符 （+） 来转换<xref:System.Windows.Point>结构<xref:System.Windows.Vector>结构。

trans-unit.source: The first vector to add.
trans-unit.target: 要相加的第一个向量。

trans-unit.source: The second vector to add.
trans-unit.target: 要相加的第二个向量。

trans-unit.source: Adds two vectors and returns the result as a vector.
trans-unit.target: 将两个向量相加并将结果以向量形式返回。

trans-unit.source: The sum of <paramref name="vector1" /> and <paramref name="vector2" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="vector1" /> 与 <paramref name="vector2" /> 的和。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this operator (+) to add two <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structures and return a <xref:System.Windows.Vector>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此运算符 （+） 来添加两个<xref:System.Windows.Vector>结构和返回<xref:System.Windows.Vector>。

trans-unit.source: The vector to divide.
trans-unit.target: 作为除数的向量。

trans-unit.source: The scalar by which <c>vector</c> will be divided.
trans-unit.target: <c>vector</c> 将除以的标量。

trans-unit.source: Divides the specified vector by the specified scalar and returns the resulting vector.
trans-unit.target: 将指定向量除以指定标量，并返回结果向量。

trans-unit.source: The result of dividing <paramref name="vector" /> by <paramref name="scalar" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="vector" /> 除以 <paramref name="scalar" /> 的结果。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this operator (/) to divide a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structure by a scalar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此运算符 （/） 将划分<xref:System.Windows.Vector>标量结构。

trans-unit.source: The first vector to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个向量。

trans-unit.source: The second vector to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个向量。

trans-unit.source: Compares two vectors for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个向量是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> components of <paramref name="vector1" /> and <paramref name="vector2" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="vector1" /> 和 <paramref name="vector2" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> 分量相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A vector's <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> properties are described using <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: 向量的<xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A>属性描述了使用<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on it, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structures that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因为的值<xref:System.Double>它，比较两个执行算术运算时可能会丢失精度<xref:System.Windows.Vector>逻辑上相等的结构可能会失败。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this operator (==) to check whether two <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此运算符 （= =） 来检查两个<xref:System.Windows.Vector>结构是否相等。

trans-unit.source: Converts a vector into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: 将向量转换为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: The vector to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要变换的向量。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> values of this vector.
trans-unit.target: 使用此向量的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> 值创建 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" />。

trans-unit.source: A point with <see cref="P:System.Windows.Point.X" />- and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Point.Y" />-coordinate values equal to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> offset values of <paramref name="vector" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个点，其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Point.X" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Point.Y" /> 坐标值与 <paramref name="vector" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> 偏移值相等。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to convert a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> into a <xref:System.Windows.Point>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将转换<xref:System.Windows.Vector>到<xref:System.Windows.Point>。

trans-unit.source: The vector to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要变换的向量。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> from the offsets of this vector.
trans-unit.target: 根据此向量的偏移量创建 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> with a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Width" /> equal to the absolute value of this vector's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> property and a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Height" /> equal to the absolute value of this vector's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" />，其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Width" /> 等于此向量的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> 属性的绝对值，其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Height" /> 等于此向量的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> 属性的绝对值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to explicitly convert a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> into a <xref:System.Windows.Size>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将显式转换<xref:System.Windows.Vector>到<xref:System.Windows.Size>。

trans-unit.source: The first vector to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个向量。

trans-unit.source: The second vector to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个向量。

trans-unit.source: Compares two vectors for inequality.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个向量是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> components of <paramref name="vector1" /> and <paramref name="vector2" /> are different; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="vector1" /> 和 <paramref name="vector2" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> 分量不相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A vector's <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> properties are described using <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: 向量的<xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A>属性描述了使用<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on it, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structures that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因为的值<xref:System.Double>它，比较两个执行算术运算时可能会丢失精度<xref:System.Windows.Vector>逻辑上相等的结构可能会失败。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this operator (!=) to check whether two <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structures are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此运算符 (！ =) 检查两个<xref:System.Windows.Vector>结构是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> by the specified <see cref="T:System.Double" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" />, or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> and returns the result.
trans-unit.target: 将指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> 与指定 <see cref="T:System.Double" />、<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> 相乘并返回结果。

trans-unit.source: The scalar to multiply.
trans-unit.target: 要乘以的标量。

trans-unit.source: The vector to multiply.
trans-unit.target: 要相乘的向量。

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the specified scalar by the specified vector and returns the resulting vector.
trans-unit.target: 将指定标量与指定向量相乘，并返回结果向量。

trans-unit.source: The result of multiplying <paramref name="scalar" /> and <paramref name="vector" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="scalar" /> 与 <paramref name="vector" /> 相乘的结果。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this operator (*) to multiply a scalar by a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例说明了如何使用此运算符 （*） 来乘标量<xref:System.Windows.Vector>结构。

trans-unit.source: The vector to multiply.
trans-unit.target: 要相乘的向量。

trans-unit.source: The scalar to multiply.
trans-unit.target: 要乘以的标量。

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the specified vector by the specified scalar and returns the resulting vector.
trans-unit.target: 将指定向量与指定标量相乘，并返回结果向量。

trans-unit.source: The result of multiplying <paramref name="vector" /> and <paramref name="scalar" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="vector" /> 与 <paramref name="scalar" /> 相乘的结果。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this operator (*) to multiply a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structure by a scalar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此运算符 （*） 来乘<xref:System.Windows.Vector>标量结构。

trans-unit.source: The vector to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的向量。

trans-unit.source: The transformation to apply to <c>vector</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要应用到此 <c>vector</c> 的转换。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the coordinate space of the specified vector using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Matrix" /> 变换指定向量的坐标空间。

trans-unit.source: The result of transforming <paramref name="vector" /> by <paramref name="matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 按 <paramref name="vector" /> 变换 <paramref name="matrix" /> 的结果。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this operator (*) to multiply a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structure by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此运算符 （*） 来乘<xref:System.Windows.Vector>结构<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>结构。

trans-unit.source: The first vector to multiply.
trans-unit.target: 要相乘的第一个向量。

trans-unit.source: The second vector to multiply.
trans-unit.target: 要相乘的第二个向量。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the dot product of the two specified vector structures and returns the result as a <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: 计算两个指定向量结构的点积并将结果以 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 形式返回。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> containing the scalar dot product of <paramref name="vector1" /> and <paramref name="vector2" />, which is calculated using the following formula:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Double" />，其中包含 <paramref name="vector1" /> 和 <paramref name="vector2" /> 的标量点积，标量点积可通过下面的公式计算得出：

trans-unit.source: <c>vector1.X * vector2.X + vector1.Y * vector2.Y</c>
trans-unit.target: <c>vector1.X * vector2.X + vector1.Y * vector2.Y</c>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this operator (*) to multiply a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structure by a <xref:System.Windows.Vector>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此运算符 （*） 来乘<xref:System.Windows.Vector>结构<xref:System.Windows.Vector>。

trans-unit.source: The vector from which <c>vector2</c> is subtracted.
trans-unit.target: 从其中减去 <c>vector2</c> 的向量。

trans-unit.source: The vector to subtract from <c>vector1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要从 <c>vector1</c> 中减去的向量。

trans-unit.source: Subtracts one specified vector from another.
trans-unit.target: 从一个指定向量中减去另一个指定向量。

trans-unit.source: The difference between <paramref name="vector1" /> and <paramref name="vector2" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="vector1" /> 和 <paramref name="vector2" /> 之间的差值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this operator (-) to subtract a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structure from a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此运算符 （-） 减去<xref:System.Windows.Vector>结构<xref:System.Windows.Vector>结构。

trans-unit.source: The vector to negate.
trans-unit.target: 要求反的向量。

trans-unit.source: Negates the specified vector.
trans-unit.target: 对指定向量求反。

trans-unit.source: A vector with <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> values opposite of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> values of <paramref name="vector" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个向量，其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> 值与 <paramref name="vector" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> 值相反。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this negation operator to negate a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此求反运算符进行求反运算<xref:System.Windows.Vector>结构。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the vector.
trans-unit.target: 向量的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Converts a string representation of a vector into the equivalent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 将向量的字符串表示形式转换为等效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 等效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to convert a string representation of a vector into a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法将转换的字符串表示形式向量转换<xref:System.Windows.Vector>结构。

trans-unit.source: The vector from which <c>vector2</c> is subtracted.
trans-unit.target: 从其中减去 <c>vector2</c> 的向量。

trans-unit.source: The vector to subtract from <c>vector1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要从 <c>vector1</c> 中减去的向量。

trans-unit.source: Subtracts the specified vector from another specified vector.
trans-unit.target: 从一个指定向量中减去另一个指定向量。

trans-unit.source: The difference between <paramref name="vector1" /> and <paramref name="vector2" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="vector1" /> 和 <paramref name="vector2" /> 之间的差值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to subtract a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structure from a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法要减去<xref:System.Windows.Vector>结构<xref:System.Windows.Vector>结构。

trans-unit.source: The string specifying the format to use.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的格式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> to use the default format defined for the type of the <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" />，表示使用为 <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> 实现的类型定义的默认格式。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="IFormatProvider" /> to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: 用于格式化该值的 <see langword="IFormatProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 从操作系统的当前区域设置中获取数字格式信息的 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基础结构，但不能在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.IFormattable.ToString(System.String,System.IFormatProvider)" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.IFormattable.ToString(System.String,System.IFormatProvider)" />。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含采用指定格式的当前实例的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 返回此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> 结构的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 返回此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> 结构的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> values of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示此 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to get a string representation of a <xref:System.Windows.Vector>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法获取的字符串表示形式<xref:System.Windows.Vector>。

trans-unit.source: The culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 特定于区域的格式设置信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> structure with the specified formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式设置信息返回此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> 结构的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> values of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示此 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> component of this vector.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此向量的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> 分量。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> component of this vector.
trans-unit.target: 此向量的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.X" /> 分量。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to check two <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structures for equality.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何检查两个<xref:System.Windows.Vector>是否相等的结构。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> component of this vector.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此向量的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> 分量。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> component of this vector.
trans-unit.target: 此向量的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Vector.Y" /> 分量。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to check two <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structures for equality.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何检查两个<xref:System.Windows.Vector>是否相等的结构。
